quote: Isn't this enough? Just this world? Just THIS?
author: Tim Minchin

quote: You matter.
author: Suzanne Young,  The Treatment

quote: All are one
author: Heraclitus

quote: Make me into anything, but just love me.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Invisible Monsters

quote: All knowledge hurts.
author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones

quote: All good that we do is just for you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I've never wanted more, until I met you.
author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades of Grey

quote: Only ignorance excuses stupidity
author: Nalini Singh,  Angels' Blood

quote: I only know everything if you ask the right questions.
author: Doc Coleman

quote: Life is just a journey.
author: Princess Diana

quote: We can do anything you like. Just be with me.
author: Christine Feehan,  Magic in the Wind

quote: One more thing...
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Don't just talk, act.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You can have it all. Just not all at once.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: For you, a thousand times over
author: Khaled Hosseini,  The Kite Runner

quote: I want to love you without clutching, appreciate you without judging, join you without invading, invite you without demanding, leave you without guilt, criticize you without blaming, and help you without insulting. If I can have the same from you, then we can truly meet and enrich each other.
author: Virginia Satir

quote: Lie to me. Just to console my soul.
author: Jarod Kintz,  99 Cents For Some Nonsense

quote: I have always thirsted for knowledge, I have always been full of questions.
author: Hermann Hesse,  Siddhartha

quote: I can hate you more, but I'll never love you less.
author: Michael Morpurgo,  War Horse

quote: Relax. Just be. And be just.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Now I've gone for too longLiving like I'm not aliveSo I'm going to start over tonightBeginning with you and I
author: Hayley Williams

quote: What am I dying for?
author: Stephenie Meyer,  The Host

quote: We all can be only who we are, no more, no less.
author: Terry Goodkind,  Stone of Tears

quote: I only know that I know nothing
author: Socrates

quote: Want less, live more
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: There are never enough 'I love you's.
author: Lenny Bruce

quote: You've maddened me for you...have changed everything. So, I'm going to f*ck you long and hard, beauty, because if I'm to be enslaved by you-I want to be your master as well.
author: Kresley Cole,  Pleasure of a Dark Prince

quote: Minus One [10w] We more people we fuckthe more lonely we become.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: All knowledge is worth having.
author: Jacqueline Carey,  Kushiel's Dart

quote: I'm bored with it all. - Last Words
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: You are one thing only. You are a Divine Being. An all-powerful Creator. You are a Deity in jeans and a t-shirt, and within you dwells the infinite wisdom of the ages and the sacred creative force of All that is, will be and ever was.
author: Anthon St. Maarten,  Divine Living: The Essential Guide To Your True Destiny

quote: Its a bit mad. Too bad, I mean, that getting to know each just for a fleeting second Must be replaced by unperfect knowledge of the featureless wholeLike some pocket history of the world, so generalAs to constitute a sob or wail
author: John Ashbery,  Self-Portrait in a Convex Mirror
تركي الدخيل,  كيف تربح المال بأقل مجهود!

quote: We just had a near-life experience!
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Love and honor the world around you, and you experience life in its fullest. There is no “Other.” There is simply us. The all of us, the whole of us. The mankind of us. Anything else is a lie.
author: Cassandra Blizzard

quote: Becoming hurts.
author: Kat Howard

quote: We understand more than we know.
author: Margaret Atwood,  Oryx and Crake

quote: The more you know, the less you need.
author: Yvon Chouinard,  Let My People Go Surfing: The Education of a Reluctant Businessman

quote: Love [10w] Love is a time machineset to your perfect present
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I want to be with you forever and beyond...
author: Gail Carson Levine,  Ella Enchanted

quote: You looove me. (holds out arms) You love me this much.
author: James Patterson,  Saving the World and Other Extreme Sports

quote: But because truly being here is so much; because everything here apparently needs us, this fleeting world, which in some strange way keeps calling to us. Us, the most fleeting of all. Once for each thing. Just once; no more. And we too, just once. And never again. But to have been this once, completely, even if only once: to have been at one with the earth, seems beyond undoing.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: I know it's wrong - God, it's all kinds of wrong - but I just want to lie down with you and wake up with you, just once, just once ever in my life.
author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Glass

quote: But whateverHoweverWhenever this ends I want you to knowThat right nowI love you forever
author: Andrea Gibson,  How It Ends

quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare,  All's Well That Ends Well

quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I am tired, Beloved, of chafing my heart againstThe want of you;Of squeezing it into little inkdrops,And posting it.
author: Amy Lowell

quote: Maybe we all just exist, all versions of us exist at times, and we have to figure out a way to get to each of them, to find each one and tell that version that it's okay, that it's all justthe way it works, a concept too powerful to ignore but too complicated to explain.
author: John Corey Whaley,  Noggin

quote: if you want it really, you get it !!!
author: Ravinder Singh

quote: you're an expert at sorry and keeping the lines blurry
author: Taylor Swift
